MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL20 postcode area of Llangollen, affecting properties in Y Maes and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a piece of faulty equipment on the overhead cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:50pm  on 20th October 2020.
